function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate change shifting malarial zones in India","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria in new areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted vector control interventions in newly affected areas","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping and monitoring technologies for vector control","People":"Population at risk of malaria in newly affected areas","Owner":"Public health authorities and local communities"},{"Description":"Effect of economic growth, irrigation, farming, and urbanization on malaria risk","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria due to changes in environmental factors","Mitigation":"Implementation of integrated vector management strategies in urban and rural areas","Technologies":"Integrated pest management, water management technologies","People":"Urban and rural populations at risk of malaria","Owner":"Local government and agricultural authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of development activities on seasonal malaria trends","Impact":"Influence on seasonal malaria trends due to changes in landscape and environment","Mitigation":"Implementation of environmental impact assessments and sustainable development practices","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, remote sensing technologies","People":"Communities living in areas undergoing development activities","Owner":"Environmental regulatory bodies and development agencies"}]}
